plays.text: Penalty to Jeff Friesen 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Mike Johnson
Penalty to Ladislav Nagy 2 minutes for Elbowing Jeff Friesen
Penalty to Pavel Trnka 2 minutes for Holding Shane Doan
Penalty to Mike Leclerc 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Steve Rucchin 2 minutes for High Sticking Mike Johnson
Goal scored by Claude Lemieux assisted by Daniel Briere and Drake Berehowsky
Goal scored by Steve Rucchin assisted by German Titov
Goal scored by German Titov assisted by Samuel Pahlsson
